game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Remote Play Together, HDR available, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 차원을 넘나드는 마법 소녀가 되어 2차 세계대전 좀비 무리에 맞서 싸우세요. 혼자 또는 최대 6명의 팀과 함께! 아내의 외모와 의상을 꾸미고, 다양한 무기와 능력을 사용하여 언데드 무리로부터 살아남으세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Fight waves of WW2 zombies as an interdimensional magical anime girl, alone, or with a team of up to 6! Customize your waifu's appearance and outfit, and wield a wide array of weapons and powers as you struggle to survive the undead horde.
